Author: lauryleah
Text: same i always feel like thanks for making me WISH i COULD eat those foods but i CAN'T

Author: sselfpity
Text: weird is a bit of a harsh way to put it- but think about this. They're just trying to be kind, for non-ed people, eating food (of any kind) with other people is just a friendly invitation. They're not trying to make some comment about you. You can either explain that you don't want to be invited for that sort of thing- or just keep politely turning them down. However, it's not worth being mad at the individual people... They're likely just doing their best to be friendly.
